topic.title: Urt - Urban Terror (4.3.1) free to play
topic.body:
Urban Terrorâ„¢ is a free **multiplayer first person shooter** developed by FrozenSand, that will run on any Quake III Arena compatible engine. It is available for Windows, Linux and Macintosh.

Urban Terror can be described as a *Hollywood tactical shooter*; somewhat realism based, but the motto is *"fun over realism"*. This results in a very unique, enjoyable and addictive game.

No registration required: Download, install, play!

1_1JdGXbK1sdR6NC4XXivbn8tsKjcsmBc1Ej.body: that's a game, sorry for wrong category, anyone knows how to fix that?
